author: Jamie Golombek
title: How to get the coronavirus-related benefits the government is offering people
description: Jamie Golombek: Here’s a quick summary of the major tax changes affecting individuals
content:
The federal government this past week announced a variety of tax measures to help Canadians facing hardship as a result of the COVID-19 outbreak. Heres a quick summary of the major tax changes affecting individuals.
